body:
Staff,

Is there a way to earn your way back to avicus if you have been banned? if so i would like to know.
please reply, i love avicus as a server and greatly enjoy playing on it. I am sorry if i caused any confusion and would like to repent.
 please consider my plea,
Beginnus

title: Questions about Bans

replies.body: You can email support@avicus.net with your appeal/why you should be unbanned. If you have anymore questions, add me on skype - pelpelajax.
replies.body_tagged: You can email support@avicus.net with your appeal/why you should be unbanned. If you have anymore questions, add me on skype - pelpelajax.
